mapper.select: SELECT board_id as boardId, user_name as userName, board_title as boardTitle, board_contents as boardContents, board_views as boardViews, created_time as createdTime FROM board_table ORDER BY created_time ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_table (user_name, board_title, board_contents, board_views, created_time) VALUES (#{userName}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents}, #{boardViews}, #{createdTime})
